annotations:
DEAR SIRS/MADAMS
GD DAY
PLS PROPOSE SUITABLE VSL FOR BELOW CGO :
~ MIN 40,000MT UP TO VESSEL FULL LOAD OF SILICA SANDS IN BULK
~ L/PORT : 1SAP KUMAI, CENTRAL KALIMANTAN, INDONESIA
~ D/PORT : 1SBP NANTONG, CHINA (MAX 11.8M FW DRAFT)
~ L/D RATE : 10,000 / 20,000MT PWWD SHINC
OR
~ D/PORT : 1SBP MACUN (MAX 11.6M SW DRAFT) OR TAIWAN AT CHARTERS OPTIONS
~ L/D RATE : 10,000 / 15,000MT PWWD SHINC
~ LAYCAN: 27-30 AUG 2024 (TRY VESSEL DATE)
~ COMM 2.5% ADD PUS
FURTHER DETAILS UPON FIRM NAME TONNAGE INTEREST
PLSD TO HEAR
Thanks & Brgds
Mr Paparas
ABLSHIPCO – Chartering Dept
Phone Cell/Whatsapp : +62-857-04000-645
E-mail : ablshipco@gmail.com // bulkchart.ablshipco@gmail.com
ABLSHIPPCO – CHARTERING DIVISION
